name: Bitzio, Inc.
tag_list: mobile, mobile-apps, mobile-games, gamification, behavioral-analytics, applications, iphone, ios, android
overview:
Bitzio, Inc. (BTZO:OB) is a mobile media and app development company focused on connecting fans of large entertainment and sports properties with the players, celebrities and teams they love. Powering the apps is the Bitzio Engine, which captures valuable user data and drives increased user monetization.

Bitzio licenses media rights of sports and entertainment properties with millions of existing fans and uses the rights to create mobile apps and web experiences the fan bases.

From the apps, Bitzio collects analytical information for targeted cross selling, used to help advertisers and sponsors gain greater conversions.
